程序包 cardgame

类 PlayerVirtual

java.lang.Object
cardgame.Play
cardgame.PlayerVirtual
public class PlayerVirtual
extends Play
The class PlayerVirtual inherit the class Play It contains targetCard next to which card the player wants to put. And we use the Strategy mode to realize the virtual player.
另请参阅:
Play

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PlayerVirtual

      public PlayerVirtual​(java.lang.String name, Strategy strategy)
      The constructor of PlayerVirtual
      参数:
      name - Name of the virtual player
      strategy - the Strategy we will use

  • 方法详细资料

    • RobotPlay

      public void RobotPlay​(Chessboard chessboard, Deck deck)
      We have three ways to play the turn, so the computer also has three ways to play the turn. It can draw a card and put the card. It can move a card, draw a card and put the card. It can draw a card, put the card and move a card.
      参数:
      chessboard - The chessboard it is playing
      deck - The deck it draws the card
      另请参阅:
      Card, Chessboard, Deck

    • PlayCard

      public void PlayCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
      It is the method how the computer put the card in the chess board. It put the card randomly but we also have to think about the size of chess board. So we will compare the Abscissa x with column and ordinate y with row to see if we can put the card. And we decide the chess board is 3*5 or 5*3 when we put the card.
      指定者:
      PlayCard 在类中 Play
      参数:
      chessboard - The chessboard it is playing
      另请参阅:
      Chessboard, Play, Card

    • MoveCard

      public void MoveCard​(Chessboard chessboard)
      It's the method how the computer move the card. The computer move the card randomly to the random position and we set the original card position as null.
      指定者:
      MoveCard 在类中 Play
      参数:
      chessboard - The chessboard it is playing
      另请参阅:
      Chessboard, Play, Card
